LanguageData.LF_Thought_HotSpringJoy.stages.0.label: Refreshing Hot Springs I
LanguageData.LF_Thought_HotSpringJoy.stages.0.descrip: The hot water relaxed my body and mind; I still feel a little warm..
LanguageData.LF_Thought_HotSpringJoy.stages.1.label: Refreshing Hot Springs II
LanguageData.LF_Thought_HotSpringJoy.stages.1.descrip: My body and mind are still refreshed from the spa. In fact, I still feel quite warm.
LanguageData.LF_Thought_HotSpringJoy.stages.2.label: Refreshing Hot Springs III
LanguageData.LF_Thought_HotSpringJoy.stages.2.descrip: My body and mind were cleansed by the hot spring. It was very refreshing!
